name: Karlson Movement
description:
I love playing Karlson, sadly it is still in beta and there are no updates. so I took things into my own hands and made a free version of Karlosn that has almost the same movement (as close as I could make it). :)

THINGS I ADDED 0.0.2:

-Enemy AI

-Post-Processing

-Main Menu:

Quit, Start, and inspiration(could have a spelling mistake lol).

-Level Selection Menu

-Switched to Universal Render Pipeline for better effects

- Switched the explosion calculation for the Exploder Gun form "addForce" to "addExplosionForce".

I am planning to add:

- Slow Motion Effect

- More guns (Shotgun Uzi and such)
